name: Getting Started
description: This category will help you get started. Unlike most worlds, the little island you landed on has very limited resources - $(o)skyblock only$(). If you are careful, frugal, and think about how you might best use something, then you will progress and be able to reach the End.$(br2)If are just starting and have not looked at $(l)$(l:the_beginning#ores)Careful with Resources$(/l)$(), I would suggest you do so.
